about_the_game:
Some stories don't need to be grim or heroic. Sometimes they are silly, awkward and focus on frogs an awful lot. Guests at the Threshold might just be one of those! A tale as old as time, a story about the Knight, the Lady and the Door. Read the cards, pick the flowers, weave some magic and strike down the evil.

This DLC is an additional side-story that can be explored separately from the main storyline.

Here you can:
  • enjoy a little retreat from the grim adventures of lady Laura;
  • find out more about the mysterious Magisterium;
  • let one promising student tell you about the ways of magic studies;
  • ...and finally learn the real name of the Witch!
